LawyerHome

LEGALL as an app, the first of its kind in India, is a self contained programme designed to provide easy access to Law and Lawyers on one platform which can be downloaded by a user to a mobile device. This app would not only help the law inquisitive minds but also the public at large as it provides some of the best services in the legal field.

We are a team of legal experts who bring to you the whole world of the legal system. Our team has individuals who have experience in the legal, business and IT industry for over 10 years and expertise in various areas. We are a team you can rely on!

To bring together the legal world and the state of the art technology to make legal services easily accessible to the common man. A legally aware nation is a prosperous nation and we work towards that dream.

Our services encompass a wide range of legal and administrative fields. We help users find lawyers, get documents scrutinized, represent their cases in international relations, register their companies and much more. For lawyers we bring to the table a wide feature set covering their needs on a day-to-day basis
1. How do I get to the lawyer once I make an appointment?
A. You will receive a notification from Legall informing you about the location of the office and rendezvous date and time of appointment, normally within 24 hours of your booking.

Do you need a template to make a contract? Agreements, notices, appointments, sale deeds, property documents and many more. Find them all here, add to cart and just sit back while we send you the template!

Stuck abroad with your papers insufficient? Facing immigration issues without access to lawyers? Do you require a good legal advice for your International Relations situation? Say no more! Legalls immigration experts are here for you!
3. Can I access Legall app outside India?
A. Certainly as long as you have a basic internet connectivity.
4. Is the client information secure and confidential?
A. All customer data is well encrypted using 128 bit security in our systems.
5. How can I avail Legall services offline?

This section provides a helping hand to all our Lawyer friends to store case data and client information, case posting dates and stages. It also would enable the Lawyer to send messages to his client about the postings.

We offer our Lawyer friends to share their case details, wherein our legal expert team would prepare synopsis or notes of arguments, with citations of High Courts and Supreme Courts. And add â€“on benefit for Lawyers whose time is precious and to make work easier and faster, rather than over burdening oneself, We will do the ground work for YOU. "
A. The Acts and Laws section, once previously loaded, can be accessed offline. The rest of the features require active internet connectivity for processing.
Kindly upload your documents and we will contact you with our quotation.\n\nMax 5 pages, if exceeds, please upload a PDF file.
Max 5 photos. If pages exceed please upload PDF file of scanned documents.
